title: Getting Queue Dodger Penalties due to Client Bugging
body:
Heyo, I'm having some trouble with the client. More than often, the game seems to not know what to do when it finds a match. Few times I've had it infinitely stuck looping "waiting for other players to accept" and other times the "waiting for other players to accept" - box sticks over to champion select, restraining me from choosing or banning champions. I've also had lobbies stopped due to "server fixing". This has led me slapped with a straight 30 minute queue dodge timers. I thought there was a step of 6 minutes?

I've tested my connection, works fine. Hextech Repair tool claims my firewall is also fine. What's the issue?

replies.body: Ah, I see the negatively impacting games issue up there. Figures. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
You're not alone, EUNE is currently having server issues but our network team is on the case!  Keep an eye on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for now for updates.
